entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
